entry.p: If you are reading this, I didn't have a chance to write a final entry to my online journal because I died unexpectedly.

Because all of my philosophical writings and musical compositions are in the public domain, they can be freely republished, recorded, etc. Unfortunately I have left some projects unfinished. Sorry about that.

The person who has published this last journal entry has been asked to modify some technical settings so that this website will in the future be located at stpeter.github.io (similarly for the Monadnock Valley Press, The Ism Book, and The Tao of Roark). Naturally, GitHub might go out of business. Nothing lasts forever. However, my repositories can be copied and republished by anyone who pleases.
Thanks for reading my musings for all these years!
